conbody.p:
An entry is a key-value pair consisting of a string key and a value of one of the following types:
bool
int
double
std::string
Container (for nesting)

example.title: Add an entry
example.p: Adding an entry can be achieved by using the Container::addEntry() base function and it's overloads.

example.title: Get an entry
example.p: Getting an entry from a deserialized Container is achieved through the Container::getEntry() function.
